title: Pmalek
author: Pmalek
content: I would like to offer my Avatar and Personal Text space to someone from the community for free. It can't be a casino or other for-profit business. Preferably, I would like it to be a project that creates some value on the Bitcoin network, but has limited or no funds for advertising. Some developer or his site from the Project Development board maybe. - No altcoin promotions or sites promoting or developing alternative coins!- You have to make your own avatar if you want me to wear it. - I reserve the right to stop the promotion at any time. It's free after all. Post your suggestions in this thread. No PM begging.
